CHAT.comment: diary for nina2: nina was rather tired when this tape was recorded , since she had not had a nap. she had been in the house all morning and was rather bored with her room. bob smith had just set up the tape recorder. nina is looking for him.

u.a: runs to the door and looks for bob
nina means to the store
nina puts a little plate on her foot . she laughs because it looks funny .
nina has picked up a toy car
nina is making the sound of a car
putting the little car on a cardboard picture of village streets surrounded by lawns
nina hands me a car
hands he mother the cow
nina starts jabbering nonsense
points to the eyes of the cow
points to her own eyes
mother laughs
nina points to her own ears and then points to her mother's ears .
nina pulls at her mother's ears . nina and her mother laugh . nina pulls her mother's hair over her ears to hide them .
nina thinks this is very funny and starts laughing
nina laughing a lot
reaches for her mother's other ear
nina is laughing so hard that it is hard to make out what she is saying . she stops and picks up a cow .
<bef> nina goes over to her shelf to look for other farm animals
nina hand the horse to her mother
nina picks up a dog that our neighbor had just given her . she really loves it .
mrs . wood is the neighbor
hugs the dog
nina does not pronounce the word correctly
holds the dog out to her mother
points to the toy barn
goes to look for her sheep
nina knocks down some blocks as she is looking for the sheep
nina falls down on the floor
nina put a big stress on the word down
ronnie is a friend of nina's .
mother picks up a white stuffed lamb
points to the various parts on the lamb
picks up a pair of socks
mother is putting on the first sock
looks at a scratch on her knee
the socks have been put on nina's feet
mother puts pants on nina
<bef> picks up her doll
nina starts jabbering
<bef> makes the dogs head turn around
nina trys to turn around the head of mrs . wood's dog . the head does not turn .
<bef> hears some loud crying noises coming from outside
nina is still trying to turn the head on mrs . wood's dog .
<bef> points to the dog's tail
mother and nina look around for the cars
Nina is very anxious about being left when her mother goes to work every day .
Nonna is the italian word for grandmother .
points to the duck's wings
hands cup to Nina
mother takes the cup from Nina
mother hands cup to Nina
Nina picks up a toy dog
Nina is talking to the puppet . mother has the puppet on her hand and talks back to Nina .
Nina gives the puppet a kiss .
Nina makes the puppet kiss the dog .
mother gives the puppet a kiss
laughs
Nina begins to jabber
drives her car across the towel . Nina puts the little dog in the wagon of her toy train .
points to another empty car on Nina's train
picks up a toy car
puts some cars in her train
mother makes sure that the cars are in securely and that they won't fall out of the train .
pulling her train around the room
Nina has a small red rug in the middle of her room
pause
Nina picks up her pajamas from the floor
Nina is still pulling her train around the room . the train cars get twisted and fall over . Nina gets upset .
Nina gets herself all twisted up in the string that she's using to pull the train . she starts to cry .
starts to laugh
Nina starts pulling the train and laughing
jabbering
Nina mumbling to herself as she walks around her room
Nina starts playing with the barn door . every time she opens the barn door , she hears a mooing sound . Nina loves to open it . she opens and shuts the door many times .
Nina continues to play with the barn door
points to the barn
Nina closing the barn doors
points to the barn
picks up the horse and puts him in the barn
hands the train to her mother
Nina gives out a little scream
mother picks up some plastic eggs that fit one inside the other
<bef> takes the eggs apart
picked up the smallest egg
puts the two halves of the little egg together
the yellow egg falls out of Nina's hands

Nina loses interest in the eggs . she gets up and looks for something else to do . mother picks up the cardboard picture of the village street and lawns . she also picks up some little houses and trees .
picks up pieces of houses , a car and a truck and sets them on the cardboard village .
Nina picks up the pieces of the houses and starts to build
starts to whine .
points to the village streets on the cardboard
Nina looks around for him
puts the dog on the grass
Nina starts to have a bowel movement which causes her to have some discomfort .
Nina becomes distracted by something else . she starts drawing on her magic slate . one can draw a picture and make it disappear .
mother draws a picture of a street on the magic slate
mother makes the picture disappear from the slate
starts to draw another picture
mother takes doll's hand and pretends to take her for a walk
telephone is ringing in the background .
starts to build a house on the cardboard village
